code.setup: {{varname}}.turnOff();              // Start with  LED Strip RGB turned off
code.snippetCode:
// The RGB LED will turn PURPLE for 500ms(half a second) and turn off
{{varname}}.setRGB(160, 3, 255);    // 1. sets RGB LED color to purple. Change the values in the brackets to (255,0,0) for pure RED, (0,255,0) for pure GREEN and (0,0,255) for pure BLUE.
delay(500);                         // 2. change the value in the brackets (500) for a longer or shorter delay in milliseconds.
{{varname}}.setRGB(0, 0, 0);        // 3. turns RGB LED off (showing no color). Change the values in the brackets to alter the color.
delay(500);                         // 4. change the value in the brackets (500) for a longer or shorter delay in milliseconds.
